sections.description: Transform your WordPress blog into a link blog with automatic domain extraction for clean, professional link attribution.
sections.installation: Download and install through WordPress admin, or upload the plugin files to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
sections.changelog:
1.2.5

  • Complete admin interface redesign with modern card-based layout
  • Organized settings into logical sections
  • Enhanced sidebar with quick guide, changelog, and support
  • Custom checkbox styling and improved responsive design
  • Better visual hierarchy and user experience

1.2.4

  • Added manual update system with check and trigger functionality
  • Real-time update status display
  • Enhanced admin interface
